rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
蜱虫可以被静电吸引到宿主身上布里斯托大学的研究人员发现，蜱虫可以被宿主自然积累的静电吸引到比自身大几倍的气隙中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Ticks-can-be-attracted-to-hosts-by-static-electricity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Ticks-can-be-attracted-to-hosts-by-static-electricity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f691e750-f844-4307-9987-7d6506494066 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 22:59:56 -0400
新的人工智能工具可以帮助跟踪和识别复杂的果蝇行为如何判断果蝇是否饥饿？问电脑。虽然这听起来像是一个坏爸爸的笑话，但这在杜兰大学是现实，研究人员开发了一种新的人工智能工具，可以告诉你果蝇是否饥饿、困倦或唱歌（是的，果蝇唱歌）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/New-AI-tool-can-help-track-and-identify-complex-fruit-fly-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/New-AI-tool-can-help-track-and-identify-complex-fruit-fly-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1812a2f-1c5a-491f-8c5e-0c056efc86d9 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 16:10:00 -0400 New AI tool can help track and identify complex fruit fly behavior
新发现的免疫检查点受体可能有助于治疗疾病科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院的研究人员发现了一种潜在的新免疫检查点受体，可以用于治疗肺癌、肠癌以及炎症性肠病等自身免疫性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Newly-identified-immune-checkpoint-receptor-could-lead-to-treatments-for-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Newly-identified-immune-checkpoint-receptor-could-lead-to-treatments-for-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bd0feee-c536-4cd2-a3a7-381b8746bc4d Fri, 30 Jun 2023 16:03:00 -0400 Newly identified immune checkpoint receptor could lead to treatments for diseases
研究发现年龄依赖性基因突变与难治性乳腺癌有关桑福德伯纳姆普雷比学院的研究人员领导的一项研究发现，在年轻女性中，某些基因突变与难治性乳腺癌有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Study-finds-age-dependent-genic-mutations-linked-to-treatment-pressive-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Study-finds-age-dependent-genic-mutations-linked-to-treatment-pressive-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ceaa6755-8371-4a1a-99ef-c681438a33e9 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 15:52:00 -0400 Study finds age-dependent genetic mutations linked to treatment-resistant breast cancer
研究人员验证了首个 AI 生物标志物对前列腺癌 ADT 的益处发表在 NEJM Evidence 上的一项新研究的数据表明，对于主要患有中危前列腺癌的男性来说，短期 ADT 的个性化使用有望实现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Researchers-validate-first-ever-AI-biomarker-for-ADT-benefit-in-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Researchers-validate-first-ever-AI-biomarker-for-ADT-benefit-in-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05068d47-63b4-4300-a225-7d679bdd3ceb Fri, 30 Jun 2023 15:47:00 -0400 Researchers validate first-ever AI biomarker for ADT benefit in prostate cancer
对关键细菌酶的高分辨率见解可能会导致新抗生素的开发来自世界各地的科学家团队，包括都柏林三一学院的科学家，获得了对一种关键细菌酶的高分辨率结构见解，这可能有助于化学家设计新药物来抑制它，从而抑制致病细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/High-res-insights-into-key-bacterial-enzyme-could-lead-to-development-of-new-antibiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/High-res-insights-into-key-bacterial-enzyme-could-lead-to-development-of-new-antibiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0980d2b1-7295-47b0-8fb1-4ecf8ea8c96c Fri, 30 Jun 2023 15:41:00 -0400 High-res insights into key bacterial enzyme could lead to development of new antibiotics
智能神经矫形器可以使手部功能受限的患者受益手部功能有限的患者很快将受益于智能神经矫形器，使他们能够再次过上独立的生活。埃尔兰根-纽伦堡弗里德里希-亚历山大大学 (FAU) 的神经科学家 Alessandro Del Vecchio 教授博士正在通过两个新项目致力于实现这一目标，并已从巴伐利亚自由州获得了超过 130 万欧元的资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Intelligent-neuro-orthosis-could-benefit-病人-with-limited-hand-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Intelligent-neuro-orthosis-could-benefit-病人-with-limited-hand-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30c5551c-b6fa-4a81-900b-5eb987abca03 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 15:34:00 -0400 Intelligent neuro-orthosis could benefit patients with limited hand function
创伤事件可能对青少年的学业进步产生长期影响经历自然灾害等创伤事件可能会对青少年的学业进步和未来粮食安全产生长期影响；研究人员表示，随着气候变化导致极端天气事件发生频率的增加，这个问题可能会变得更加严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Traumatic-events-may-have-long-term-consequences-for-academic-progress-of-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Traumatic-events-may-have-long-term-consequences-for-academic-progress-of-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e2a361f-3e0f-4a5e-8372-5d02a9416380 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 13:56:29 -0400 Traumatic events may have long-term consequences for academic progress of youth
测试骨质疏松药物加上“骨负荷”运动是否可以帮助老年人安全减肥维克森林大学和维克森林大学医学院将于今年夏天开始一项耗资 700 万美元的研究，该研究将有助于确定阻力训练与骨骼强化练习和/或骨质疏松药物的使用相结合是否可以帮助老年人在不牺牲骨量的情况下安全减肥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Testing-whether-osteoporosis-drugs-plus-e2809cbone-loadinge2809d-exercises-can-help-older-adults-to-safely-lose-weight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Testing-whether-osteoporosis-drugs-plus-e2809cbone-loadinge2809d-exercises-can-help-older-adults-to-safely-lose-weight.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=242928d5-f44d-40b0-9cd6-809e81b9e45b Fri, 30 Jun 2023 13:42:12 -0400 Testing whether osteoporosis drugs plus “bone-loading” exercises can help older adults to safely lose weight
多学科项目有望治疗多动症、脑震荡后综合症和记忆丧失《阿尔茨海默病报告杂志》今天发表了一篇由全国公认的神经学家 Majid Fotuhi 博士撰写的论文，详细介绍了针对注意力缺陷多动障碍 (ADHD)、脑震荡后综合症 (PCS) 或其他疾病患者的多学科计划记忆丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Multi-subject-program-shows-promise-for-treating-ADHD-post-concussion-syndrome-and-memory-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Multi-subject-program-shows-promise-for-treating-ADHD-post-concussion-syndrome-and-memory-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bcd1df9-93f4-453d-8d86-57d566333a0f Fri, 30 Jun 2023 13:33:47 -0400 Multi-disciplinary program shows promise for treating ADHD, post-concussion syndrome, and memory loss
